00045 void RainbruRPG::Network::EnetFlooderClient::eventLoop(){
00046   NetPacketBase npb;
00047 
00048   while (enet_host_service (client, & event, 700) > 0){
00049 
00050     switch (event.type){
00051     case ENET_EVENT_TYPE_CONNECT:
00052       break;
00053       
00054     case ENET_EVENT_TYPE_RECEIVE:
00055       cout << "A packet of length " <<event.packet -> dataLength
00056            <<" containing " <<event.packet -> data
00057            <<" was received from "<<event.peer -> data
00058            <<" on channel "<<event.channelID<< endl;
00059 
00060       npb.setData(event.packet -> data, event.packet -> dataLength);
00061       npb.netDeserialize();
00062       treatPacket(&npb, &event);
00063 
00064       /* Clean up the packet now that we're done using it. */
00065       enet_packet_destroy (event.packet);
00066       
00067       break;
00068       
00069     case ENET_EVENT_TYPE_DISCONNECT:
00070       cout << event.peer -> data << " disconected" << endl;
00071       
00072       /* Reset the peer's client information. */
00073       event.peer -> data = NULL;
00074 
00075     case ENET_EVENT_TYPE_NONE:
00076       break;
00077     }
00078   }
00079 
00080 }
00081 
00093 void RainbruRPG::Network::EnetFlooderClient::
00094 treatPacket(NetPacketBase* p, ENetEvent* e ){
00095 
00096   tNetPacketIdentifier i=p->getIdentifier();
00097 
00098   if (i==NPI_SVR_CONRESP){
00099     LOGI("A connection response was received");
00100     npConnectionResponse ncr;
00101     ncr.setData(e->packet -> data, e->packet -> dataLength);
00102     ncr.netDeserialize();
00103     tServerConnectionResponse res=ncr.getResponse();
00104 
00105     switch(res){
00106     case NCR_UNDEFINED:
00107       LOGW("The server response is undefined");
00108       sigConnectionUndefined.emit();
00109       break;
00110     case NCR_ACCEPTED:
00111       LOGI("The selected server accepts flooder connection");
00112       sigConnectionAccepted.emit();
00113       break;
00114     case NCR_REFUSED:
00115       LOGI("The selected server refuses flooder connection");
00116       sigConnectionRefused.emit();
00117       break;
00118 
00119     }
00120   }
00121 
00122 }

00137 int RainbruRPG::Network::EnetFlooderClient::
00138 sendPacketAndWaitResponse(NetPacketFlooderBase* p, bool reliable){
00139   // To be sure the packet is (or not) reliable
00140   p->setReliable(reliable);
00141 }
